{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$75.8K in 2021-2022** on contracts with NORTHERN CONSTRUCTION.

Across 22 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 6 have at least one amendment (27%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 67% and the average number of amendments was 2. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$637.5K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.48 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$445.9K. The longest contract was 3.85 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$6.1M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [Northern Contracting Ltd](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Northern%20Contracting%20Ltd%22)
{{< /details >}}
